title: Slack for iPad gets overhauled two-column UI, enhanced sidebar, accessibility improvements
content:
Slack has delivered an all-new version of its iPad app with an overhauled UI that aims to blend the best of the service’s mobile and desktop designs. The new Slack for iPad features a fresh two-column layout, improved sidebar, enhanced accessibility, and more.
